BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills Initiate
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] trained in the Lost Hills bunker complex, learning the original Codex under the watchful eyes of the Elder Council. [PAWN_pronoun] proved [PAWN_objective]self worthy through rigorous physical and mental trials.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills Scribe
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] dedicated [PAWN_objective]self to preserving pre-war knowledge in the vast archives beneath Lost Hills. [PAWN_pronoun] spent years cataloging technology and studying the old world's secrets.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills Knight
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] earned the rank of Knight through exemplary service and mastery of power armor. [PAWN_pronoun] upheld the strictest interpretation of the Codex, believing technology should be controlled by the worthy few.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills Paladin
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] rose to the elite rank of Paladin, leading missions to recover pre-war technology and eliminate threats to the Brotherhood. [PAWN_pronoun] embodied the warrior spirit of Roger Maxson himself.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills Senior Scribe
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] achieved senior rank in the Scribe order, overseeing research projects and training new members. [PAWN_pronoun] believed preserving knowledge was humanity's only path to survival.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills Tech Adept
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in maintaining the Brotherhood's arsenal of power armor and energy weapons. [PAWN_pronoun] viewed each piece of pre-war technology as sacred, treating them with reverence.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills Recruiter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ventured into the wastes to identify potential recruits for the Brotherhood. [PAWN_pronoun] sought only the most exceptional individuals, maintaining Lost Hills' high standards.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills Sentinel
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] held the highest rank a warrior could achieve in Lost Hills. [PAWN_pronoun] commanded respect through decades of service and unwavering dedication to the original Codex.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills Archivist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] maintained the Brotherhood's extensive data archives, ensuring no knowledge was ever lost. [PAWN_pronoun] could navigate the bunker's computer systems better than its corridors.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills Weaponsmith
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] crafted and repaired weapons in the Brotherhood's armory. [PAWN_pronoun] took pride in maintaining the chapter's arsenal to pre-war military specifications.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills Medical Officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] treated wounded Brothers in the medical bay, using both pre-war medical knowledge and wasteland improvisation. [PAWN_pronoun] saw [PAWN_objective]self as keeping the Brotherhood's most valuable resource alive.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills Security Chief
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] oversaw security protocols for the bunker complex, ensuring no unauthorized access to Brotherhood secrets. [PAWN_pronoun] was paranoid about outsider infiltration.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills Field Scribe
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] accompanied combat missions to document recovered technology. [PAWN_pronoun] balanced scholarly pursuits with basic combat training, though [PAWN_pronoun] preferred cataloging to fighting.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills Elder Councilor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served on the Elder Council, making decisions that shaped the Brotherhood's future. [PAWN_pronoun] believed Lost Hills must remain the supreme authority over all chapters.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills Power Armor Tech
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] specialized exclusively in power armor maintenance and modification. [PAWN_pronoun] knew every servo and fusion cell of the T-51b suits like [PAWN_pronoun] knew [PAWN_objective] own body.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills Logistics Officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] managed supply lines and resource allocation for the bunker. [PAWN_pronoun] ensured the Brotherhood could maintain its isolationist stance while remaining self-sufficient.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills Recon Specialist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] scouted the California wasteland for threats and technology caches. [PAWN_pronoun] moved silently through ruins, gathering intelligence for the Elder Council.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills Chemist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] studied pre-war chemical formulas and pharmaceutical knowledge. [PAWN_pronoun] synthesized medicine and experimental compounds in the Brotherhood's laboratories.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills Training Instructor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] trained new Initiates in Brotherhood doctrine and combat skills. [PAWN_pronoun] was known for [PAWN_possessive] harsh methods and uncompromising standards.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills Engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] maintained the bunker's infrastructure and life support systems. [PAWN_pronoun] understood that without working systems, all the Brotherhood's technology meant nothing.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills bunker child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in the depths of the Lost Hills bunker, never seeing the sky until [PAWN_pronoun] was old enough for training. The sterile corridors and humming computers were [PAWN_possessive] only home.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills scribe apprentice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] shadowed senior Scribes through the archives, learning to catalog pre-war technology. [PAWN_pronoun] showed early aptitude for technical knowledge.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills squire candidate
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] trained in basic combat and Brotherhood doctrine, hoping to one day wear power armor. [PAWN_pronoun] idolized the Paladins who protected the chapter.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills codex student
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] memorized passages from the original Codex written by Roger Maxson. [PAWN_pronoun] learned that the Brotherhood's way was the only way to save humanity.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills mechanic helper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] assisted in the armory workshops, fetching tools and learning basic repairs. [PAWN_pronoun] dreamed of one day maintaining power armor.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills elder's descendant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] came from a prestigious bloodline dating back to the Brotherhood's founding. [PAWN_pronoun] felt the weight of expectation from birth.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills security ward
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] shadowed security patrols through the bunker, learning to spot threats and maintain vigilance. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught to trust no outsider.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills data entry youth
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent hours at terminals inputting information into the Brotherhood's databases. [PAWN_pronoun] found the repetitive work meditative.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills gunrange youth
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent countless hours on the practice range, showing natural talent with firearms. The instructors predicted [PAWN_pronoun] would become a great warrior.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost Hills medical aide
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] helped in the medical bay, learning basic first aid and anatomy. [PAWN_pronoun] had a gentle touch and steady hands.
